data.name: Project CARS - Pagani Nürburgring Combined Track Expansion
data.detailed_description:
Pagani Huayra BC
In 2011, Pagani’s Huayra took the world of supercars by storm as the prestigious Italian sports car manufacturer delivered a turbo-powered car for the very first time. Four years later, all of the strictly-limited 100 units as have sold as Pagani celebrates the model’s success with the brand-new Huayra BC.

Pagani Zonda Revolucion
The Revolucion is Zonda’s last hooray for their famed Zonda R sports car as the Italian sports car maker ends the car’s production run with an ultra-rare, ultra-competitive version of their record-breaking creation.

Nürburgring Nordschleife + Grand Prix Track
Project CARS is inviting drivers to tackle the ultimate Nürburgring challenge, giving players access to the combined Nürburgring Grand Prix and Nordschleife layout.
data.about_the_game:
Pagani Huayra BC
In 2011, Pagani’s Huayra took the world of supercars by storm as the prestigious Italian sports car manufacturer delivered a turbo-powered car for the very first time. Four years later, all of the strictly-limited 100 units as have sold as Pagani celebrates the model’s success with the brand-new Huayra BC.

Pagani Zonda Revolucion
The Revolucion is Zonda’s last hooray for their famed Zonda R sports car as the Italian sports car maker ends the car’s production run with an ultra-rare, ultra-competitive version of their record-breaking creation.

Nürburgring Nordschleife + Grand Prix Track
Project CARS is inviting drivers to tackle the ultimate Nürburgring challenge, giving players access to the combined Nürburgring Grand Prix and Nordschleife layout.
data.short_description: Project CARS continues its commitment to deliver fresh new content and updates via its ON DEMAND programme today with the release of the Pagani Nürburgring Combined Track Expansion featuring two beautiful vehicles from the stable of Horatio Pagani !
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows Vista, Windows 7 with latest Service Packs
  • Процессор: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400, 3.0 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Видеокарта: nVidia GTX 260, ATI Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 25 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Дополнительно: For racing wheel support check: http://www.projectcarsgame.com/beyond-reality.html
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 with latest Service Packs
  • Процессор: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i7 3700, 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350
  • Видеокарта: GT600 series, AMD Radeon HD7000 series
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 25 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Дополнительно: For racing wheel support check: http://www.projectcarsgame.com/beyond-reality.html
